Desserts.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Cream together butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in vanilla.
Dissolve baking soda in hot water. Add to batter along with salt. Stir in flour and chocolate chips. Drop by large spoonfuls onto ungreased pans.
Bake for about 10 minutes in preheated oven, or until edges are nicely browned.
